id.description: Unique identifier for this agent (UUID or similar).

version.description: Version number of this agent definition. For semantic versioning, use version_string field.

version_string.description: Semantic version string (e.g., '1.2.0') for the agent definition.

lifecycle.description: Lifecycle status of this agent version.

compatibility.description: Compatibility information for this agent version.

previous_versions.description: List of compatible previous version patterns.

change_log.description: Change log information for this version.

type.description: Type of change in this version.

description.description: Detailed description of the agent’s purpose and behavior.

role.description: Short role label for the agent (e.g., 'Creative Producer').

llm.description: Identifier of the primary LLM provider or model family used by this agent (e.g., 'openai').

llm_settings.description: Model configuration settings for the LLM.

max_tokens.description: Maximum tokens to generate in a single completion.

owner.description: Owner or namespace for this agent (e.g., 'admin').

document_index_id.description: Primary RAG index identifier associated with this agent, if any.

rag.description: Associated RAG index configurations this agent can use.

tools.description: Tools that this agent can call during reasoning and execution.

memory.description: Memory configuration for the agent, defining how it stores, retrieves, and governs state across interactions.

scope.description: Scope of memory visibility and sharing.

privacy.description: Privacy and security settings for memory.

pii.description: Whether memory may contain personally identifiable information.

encryption.description: Whether memory data should be encrypted at rest.

id.description: Unique ID of the RAG index.

name.description: Human-readable name for the RAG index.

virtual_index_path.description: Virtual path or logical mount point under which this index is exposed.

remote_path.description: Optional remote path or bucket/key for the index.

metadata.description: Arbitrary metadata associated with this RAG index.

ToolDefinition.title: Tool Definition
ToolDefinition.description: A callable tool the agent can invoke. Supports both simple RAG tools and rich capability-style tools.

id.description: Optional unique identifier for the tool (e.g., UUID).

tool_id.description: Optional external or catalog ID for this tool.

version.description: Optional version number of the tool definition.

name.description: Code-readable tool name used for invocation.

display_name.description: Human-friendly display name for UI surfaces.

description.description: Detailed description of what this tool does and how the agent should use it.

category.description: Optional category for organizing tools (e.g., 'File Operations', 'RAG', 'Image Generation').

parameters.description: List of parameters this tool accepts.

returns.description: Optional schema for the tool’s return value.

description.description: Human-readable explanation of the return value.

dependencies.description: Optional list of runtime dependencies (e.g., pip packages with optional pinned versions).

keys_schema.description: Optional key / credential schema, typically for environment variables.

sources.description: Optional list of source references for this tool (e.g., repos, docs).

permissions.description: Optional sandbox permissions for this tool.

network.description: Whether outbound network access is allowed.

file_read.description: List of directories or paths this tool may read from.

file_write.description: List of directories or paths this tool may write to.

env_vars.description: List of environment variable names this tool may access.

status.description: Lifecycle status of this tool, e.g., 'active', 'deprecated'.

code_file.description: Relative path to the Python file implementing this tool.

created_by.description: User or system that created this tool definition.

created_at.description: ISO-8601 timestamp of when this tool was created.

invocation.description: Invocation configuration for this tool (how the agent should call it).

function.description: Optional function name or entrypoint when type is 'python_function'.

ToolParameter.title: Tool Parameter
ToolParameter.description: Definition of a single parameter accepted by a tool.

name.description: Parameter name as used in the tool’s function signature or input schema.

default.description: Optional default value if the parameter is omitted.

KeySchemaItem.title: Key Schema Item
KeySchemaItem.description: Definition of a required key (typically for environment-based configuration).

name.description: Name of the key or environment variable.

description.description: Description of what this key is used for.
